ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
Class GLShader

java.lang.Object
  ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.GLShader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shader
public class GLShader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shader

This class manages an OpenGL shader. It will load the shader source code into OpenGL, store a reference to the shader and make that available as well as providing the service of enabling or disabling a shader.

Only works with OpenGL ES 2.0

Constructor Summary
GLShader()
          Instantiates a new OpenGL shader.
 
Method Summary
 void disable()
          Disables the shader and goes back to using OpenGL standard functionality to process vertices and fragments/pixels.

          Loads a shader into OpenGL. uses the vertex and fragment shader source code to pass to OpenGL where the actual shader is created.
 void use()
          Activate the shader program.

Method Detail

load

public int load(java.lang.String vertexSource,
                java.lang.String fragmentSource)
         throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: Shader
Loads a shader into OpenGL. uses the vertex and fragment shader source code to pass to OpenGL where the actual shader is created. An OpenGL shader is represented by an Integer id.

Specified by:
load in interface Shader
Parameters:
vertexSource - the vertex shader file name
fragmentSource - the fragment shader file name
Returns:
the id of the shader in OpenGL
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - the exception

use

public void use()
Activate the shader program. As long as the shader is active, the vertex shader is executed for each vertex, and the fragment shader for each pixel that is rendered.

Specified by:
use in interface Shader

disable

public void disable()
Disables the shader and goes back to using OpenGL standard functionality to process vertices and fragments/pixels.

Specified by:
disable in interface Shader

getProgram

public int getProgram()
Description copied from interface: Shader
Gets the OpenGL representation of a shader.

Specified by:
getProgram in interface Shader
Returns:
the id of the shader
